supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-22 (in mm), (1) 21 x 58, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 34 x 8, (A) traces of 4 lines, black and red ink, no margins, (B) trace, (3) 28 x 14, (A) 4 lines, black and red ink, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 36 x 12, (A) 6 lines, black and red ink, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 43 x 19, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) trace, (6) 40 x 24, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (7) 39 x 27, (A) 2 cols., col.i, 4 lines, left margin, col.ii, 2 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (8) 34 x 25, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 16 x 22, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 21 x 32, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 27 x 19, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 32 x 8, (A) 2 lines, black and red ink, (B) blank, (13) 31 x 16, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 32 x 19, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (15) 33 x 22, (A) 5 lines, black and red ink, no margins, (B) blank, (16) 20 x 20, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (17) 41 x 15, (A) traces of 5 (?) lines, no margins, (B) blank, (18) 43 x 34, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (19) 35 x 37, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (20) 46 x 60, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) trace, (21) 46 x 58, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (22) 50 x 34, (A) traces of 4 lines, vertical and horizontal lines in grid pattern, (B) 5 lines, top margin
